title: something close to Rolex watch face fonts
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rolex1_6676.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rolex3_4394.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rolex2_3886.jpg)

For an art project, a friend is looking for readily accessible fonts that would approximate these.  
My first suggestions were:  
- For ROLEX, an expanded, emboldened version of Open Baskerville  
- For EXPLORER and SUBMARINER, Copperplate regular or light  
- for SUPERLATIVE CHRONOMETER, ?

What would you use to emulate these?
author: eliason

comments.content:
Hello

For ROLEX try:

{Link removed by moderator}

or

[http://www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Serif-Bold.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005204026/http:/www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Serif-Bold.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Liberation-Serif-Bold.font")

Alex.

Alex, please don’t post link to fonts that are obvious rip-offs of commercial fonts. The font you linked to is a copy of Clarendon.  
Thank you.
